item.name: Fletcher's Tools
additionalEntries: Although maintaining of ranged weapons is usually left to the experts, a crafty adventurer can ensure plenty of usage of these tools in making sure their ranged weaponry is up to speed.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Fletcher's tools consist of a small knife, glue made from animal fat,

item.name: +1 Leather
additionalEntries: A remnant of a beast or animal.

additionalEntries.name: Crafting
entries: With a DC16 {@item Leatherworker's Tools|PHB} check, convert this item into {@item +1 Leather Armor|PHB} during a long rest.
